original_title: Wartime Aircraft of the Fleet Air Arm
overview: This popular title provides a definitive film record of all the most significant aircraft types used by the Fleet Air Arm in both WWII and Korea, combining newly discovered archive film with exclusive aircrew interviews. The Fairey Barracuda and Swordfish, Skua, Sea Hurricane, Seafire, Martlet, Hellcat, Corsair, Avenger, Sea Fury and Firefly are all included.
title: Wartime Aircraft of the Fleet Air Arm
